item.title: Need help with make ppl on my server mods!?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

FIRST OF ALL,[b] DO NOT BUMP YOUR TOPIC!!![\b]
Second of all, there was NO need to post this as a poll.

Just to answer your question, You go to character file click on the character name(whoâ€™s you wanna make mod\admin) Then beside character right change 0 to 1 for mod 2 for admin 3 for owner(you can only have 1 owner unless you make two account from same ip.
